My generative AI toolbox

Generative (Gen) AI tools that I use on a regular basis currently are listed below.

From a browser:

  • ChatGPT.
  • Claude.
  • NotebookLM.
  • perplexity.

From the command line:

  • claude.
  • llm.
  • qwen.

Inside VSCode:

  • GitHub Copilot.
  • RooCode.
    • qdrant for codebase (semantic) indexing.

Inside JetBrains IDEs:

  • AI Assistant.
  • ProxyAI.
  • Junie.
  • RunVSAgent.

To experiment with language models locally:

  • LM Studio.
  • ollama.

For packaging an entire repo into a single file:

  • repomix.
June 27, 2025 · ai, generative, genai, toolbox
